ygData.msgSnippet: ... DrillBit reached Phobia s ship. Lets move! ... K9 walked from Kluster, to an empty room, and went to sleep. ... Hot Rod continued to sleep, in his room.

::DrillBit::

DrillBit reached Phobia's ship.
"Lets move!"

::K9::

K9 walked from Kluster, to an empty room, and went to sleep.

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod continued to sleep, in his room.
